tool_description: Get any random White or Black card for your Cards Against Humanity Game
name: Cards Against Humanity
title: Cards Against Humanity

api_list.name: Multiple White Cards
api_list.description: Returns an array of random White Cards with all required information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cards-against-humanity.p.rapidapi.com/white/10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cards-against-humanity.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cards-against-humanity.p.rapidapi.com/white/{num}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cards-against-humanity.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
